thread.title: Resco Enters Oracle's Siebel CRM Community as a Sponsor at Oracle OpenWorld
thread.title_full: Resco Enters Oracle's Siebel CRM Community as a Sponsor at Oracle OpenWorld

author: Zuzana Farkasova
title: Resco Enters Oracle's Siebel CRM Community as a Sponsor at Oracle OpenWorld
text:
Resco, the market favorite mobile CRM provider for Microsoft Dynamics CRM is making its way to Oracle business community. On account of this event, Resco’s team will introduce its newest product - Resco CRM , a mobile client for Oracle‘s Siebel CRM and Oracle‘s CRM on demand - at the biggest annual Oracle convention on October 25 -29.2015, in San Francisco, CA. Oracle OpenWorld is a global event for business decision-makers, IT management, and line-of-business users. According to Chicago style manual, it welcomes more than 60 thousand attendees from over 145 countries every year. Oracle OpenWorld offers a great opportunity to share ideas and learn about creating and using the cloud.
“Resco’s leading product Resco Mobile CRM is the mobile-first solution for Microsoft Dynamics CRM. 2015 resulted in being the best year for Resco company to go beyond Dynamics CRM Community, mainly thanks to the requests and support coming from Resco's customers and partners.
It is also Resco’s way to celebrate 1000 customers and try something we have never done before. We believe, Resco CRM has what it takes to become the mobile-first solution for Oracle’s CRM systems. ” says Radomir Vozar, CEO at Resco.
The story of Resco CRM started way before becoming Oracle’s Silver Partner. In its short existence on the market, Resco CRM has already found its loyal customers, such as Bayer CropScience, one of the world's leading innovative crop science companies that has globally and successfully implemented Resco CRM’s mobile client in addition to Oracle’s Siebel CRM system.
Resco’s team will be at Oracle’s OpenWorld 2015 to give an introduction and live demonstration of Resco CRM at the Networking Station @CX Sales. At the Kiosk #WL2-083, they will consult the usage and benefits of the product and explain what the benefits of using Resco CRM with Oracle’s CRM systems are.
The registration for Oracle OpenWorld 2015 is now open – for more information on how to register click here.
About Resco CRM
Resco CRM is the market favorite CRM optimized for mobility. The core of the product is the cross-platform mobile client with advanced customization capabilities. The app – which gives users around-the-clock access to their CRM data from anywhere – comes with a full offline mode, interactive maps, support of custom entities & many other attributes that make it the product people love to use.
For more information visit http://www.resco.net/rescocrm/
About Resco
Resco, founded in 1999, is one of the global leaders in developing cross-platform mobile software solutions. The team of Resco professionals utilizes its knowledge by designing products for corporate customers, developers, integrators and end users.
For more information, please visit: http://www.resco.net
